tag_list: carecloud, mike-cuesta, ux, innovation, miami, avisena, marketing, online-marketing, usability-expert, physician-marketing
overview:
Mike Cuesta is a design-driven and technology-focused marketing strategist and entrepreneur with with over 10 years of experience in marketing, user experience and web strategy. He is currently Director of Marketing & User Experience at CareCloud, where he drives the strategy, direction and execution of the company’s marketing programs, including corporate communications, online marketing, demand generation, social and community engagement. Mr. Cuesta’s passion for user experience has garnered multiple awards and recognition for CareCloud.com, including The Web Marketing Association’s WebAward, International Academy of the Visual Arts’s W3 Award and a Webby Award.

Previously, he was Senior Designer at Avisena, where he grew the online marketing, branding and product management programs that directly contributed to a 62% year-over-year revenue increase from 2007 to 2008.

Mike was granted a scholarship to the Visual Arts Conservatory at Miami Dade College before studying Business Administration and Marketing at Florida International University. He was listed in WebDesigner magazine as one of the Most Influential Designers of 2004.
